mainBoard.name: Bladetusk Boar
mainBoard.originalText: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

rulings.text: If an attacking creature has intimidate, what colors it is matters only as the defending player declares blockers. Once it's blocked, changing its colors won't change that.

Intimidate looks at the current colors of a creature that has it. Normally, Bladetusk Boar can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures. If it's turned blue, then it can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or blue creatures.

foreignData.flavorText: Один раз отмерь, два раза отрежь.

foreignData.text: Существа под вашим контролем получают Двойной удар до конца хода. (Они наносят боевые повреждения как на этапе Первого удара, так и на этапе обычных повреждений.)

foreignData.flavorText: 打量一次，下刀两次。
foreignData.name: 持刀暴乱
foreignData.text: 由你操控的生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。（它们能造成先攻与普通战斗伤害。）

foreignData.flavorText: 打量一次，下刀兩次。
foreignData.name: 持刀暴亂
foreignData.text: 由你操控的生物獲得連擊異能直到回合結束。（它們能造成先攻與普通戰鬥傷害。）

mainBoard.name: Cleaver Riot
mainBoard.originalText: Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

rulings.text: Cleaver Riot affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. It won’t affect creatures that come under your control later in the turn.

mainBoard.text: Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

mainBoard.flavorText:
"You're in luck. I brought enough to share."
—Chandra Nalaar

foreignData.flavorText: „Du hast Glück. Ich kann ein paar abgeben." —Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Flammen des Hitzkopfs
foreignData.text: Flammen des Hitzkopfs fügt 3 Schadenspunkte zu, deren Aufteilung auf ein, zwei oder drei Ziele deiner Wahl, die Kreaturen und/oder Spieler sein können, du bestimmst.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tienes suerte. Traigo suficiente como para compartir." —Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Llamas de la instigadora
foreignData.text: Las Llamas de la instigadora hacen 3 puntos de daño divididos como elijas entre una, dos o tres criaturas y/o jugadores objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vous avez de la chance. Je suis partageuse. » —Chandra Nalaàr
foreignData.name: Flammes du brandon
foreignData.text: Les Flammes du brandon infligent 3 blessures réparties de la manière que vous choisissez entre une, deux ou trois cibles, créatures et/ou joueurs.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sei fortunato. Ne ho portato abbastanza da condividere." —Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente
foreignData.text: Le Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente infliggono 3 danni suddivisi a tua scelta tra una, due o tre creature e/o giocatori bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「あんたは幸せよ。私のものを分けてあげる。」 ――チャンドラ・ナラー
foreignData.name: 炬火の炎
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレイヤーを、望む組み合わせで1つまたは望む組み合わせでつか3つ対象とする。炬火の炎はそれらに、３点のダメージを好きなように分割して与える。

foreignData.flavorText: "운수도 좋군. 부족하지 않을 정도로 가져왔지." —찬드라 날라르
foreignData.name: 선동가의 불길
foreignData.text: 생물 및 플레이어를 대상으로 최대 세 개까지의 목표를 정한다. 선동가의 불길은 그 목표들에게 피해 3점을 당신이 나눈 대로 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Você está com sorte. Eu trouxe o suficiente para compartilhar." — Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Chamas da Instigadora
foreignData.text: Chamas da Instigadora causa 3 pontos de dano distribuídos à sua escolha entre uma, duas ou três criaturas e/ou jogadores alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Тебе повезло — могу поделиться». — Чандра Налаар
foreignData.name: Пламя Разжигательницы
foreignData.text: Пламя Разжигательницы наносит 3 повреждения, разделенные по вашему выбору между одним, двумя или тремя целевыми существами и (или) игроками.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你走好运啦。我带来的够大家享用。」～茜卓纳拉
foreignData.name: 惹事人烈焰
foreignData.text: 惹事人烈焰对一个，两个，或三个目标生物和／或牌手造成共3点伤害，你可以任意分配。

foreignData.flavorText: 「你走好運啦。我帶來的夠大家享用。」 ～茜卓納拉
foreignData.name: 惹事人烈焰
foreignData.text: 惹事人烈焰對一個，兩個，或三個目標生物和／或玩家造成共3點傷害，你可以任意分配。

mainBoard.name: Flames of the Firebrand
mainBoard.originalText: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: You divide the damage as you cast Flames of the Firebrand, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage. (In other words, as you put the spell on the stack, you choose whether to have it deal 3 damage to a single target, 2 damage to one target and 1 damage to another target, or 1 damage to each of three targets.)

mainBoard.text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

foreignData.flavorText: Kein Rückgrat, kein Ruhm.
foreignData.name: Wilde Vermutung
foreignData.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um Wilde Vermutung zu wirken, eine Karte aus deiner Hand ab.
Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: Sin riesgo no hay gloria.
foreignData.name: Probar suerte
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar Probar suerte, descarta una carta.
Roba dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: Pas de cran, pas de gloire.
foreignData.name: Supposition au hasard
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer la Supposition au hasard, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: Non c'è gloria per chi non ha fegato.
foreignData.name: Tentativo Disperato
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare il Tentativo Disperato, scarta una carta.
Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 覚悟なくば栄光なし。
foreignData.name: 野生の勘
foreignData.text:
野生の勘を唱えるための追加コストとして、カードを１枚捨てる。
カードを２枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: 용기없는 자, 영광을 누리지 못하리라.
foreignData.name: 엉뚱한 추측
foreignData.text:
엉뚱한 추측을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
카드 두 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Sem risco, não existe glória.
foreignData.name: Aposta Cega
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar Aposta Cega, descarte um card.
Compre dois cards.

foreignData.flavorText: Была не была!
foreignData.name: Случайная Догадка
foreignData.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания Случайной Догадки сбросьте карту.
Возьмите две карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 没有勇气，就没有荣耀。
foreignData.name: 胡乱推测
foreignData.text:
弃一张牌，以作为施放胡乱推测的额外费用。
抓两张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 沒有勇氣，就沒有榮耀。
foreignData.name: 胡亂推測
foreignData.text:
棄一張牌，以作為施放胡亂推測的額外費用。
抽兩張牌。

mainBoard.name: Wild Guess
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast Wild Guess, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: Because discarding a card is an additional cost, you can’t cast Wild Guess if you have no other cards in hand.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
